attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do not build trident submarines rather build hunter killer submarines with Nuclear armed Cruise missles in addition to normal equipment and able to carry RM and special forces. 
Do not buy VSTOL JSF for the new carriers. Buy instead the conventional JSF and equip the carriers with catapults and arrester wires thus allowing inter operability with US forces and saving money.
